1178990.name: Visual Novel Maker - Cute Cartoon Voice Pack
1178990.description:
Need cute and charming voice effects for your cute and charming characters? This pack has you covered! Including 164 sound effects interpreted by two different actors divided by category into general dialogue and emotions, this pack has all the cute and cuddly phrases and sounds to help bring your characters and games to life!

Features:

* Ogg and M4a formats included
* Perfect for cartoon-themed games.
* Recorded by professional voice actors
* For use in Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice
